thread.title: Friendly - ideally located near the Coliseum
thread.title_full: Friendly - ideally located near the Coliseum - Review of Capo d'Africa Hotel, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Dil H
title: Friendly - ideally located near the Coliseum
text:
Hotel was fresh, clean with a modern look. Room was spacious and very comfortable. Staff, especially the Manager was so so helpful. Wonderful top floor rooftop breakfast area. Would highly recommend this Hotel.
Room Tip: Downstairs adjoining rooms - great for a family See more room tips
